jobDescription: Scope of Work  Data Analyst Specialist  All candidates must be either a US Citizen or hold a Permanent Resident Card as well as be a direct W-2 employee to our vendors.  The Business Engineering (BE) group, within the Investments and Capital Markets Business Technology Office (I&CM; BTO), is responsible for delivering and managing technology solutions that support the entire I&CM; division. BE works closely with our customers across the organization to develop/maintain solutions and infrastructure that enhance and streamline business processes. We also support critical data-centric infrastructure and processes vital to I&CM.; The candidate will work closely with BE team members, business partners, and IT teams to support a range of small- to medium-sized projects within I&CM.; We are seeking a self-motivated leader who can provide system analysis and project management support. SCOPE OF WORK/TASKSCreate business requirement documentsCreate UAT test cases and any related artifactsDocument test results and training materialsCoordinate deployments by creating pre- and post-deployment tasksWork with developers to ensure defect fixes and issue resolutionTrack project status and report to senior managementDevelop and troubleshoot sql queries; support creation of DDL scriptsDevelop solutions using tools like Dataflux, Python, and shell scripts. Preferred Skills Strong data and financial analytical skillsKnowledge of fixed income products, especially mortgagesExperience with databases (Sybase, DB2, SQL Server, Oracle)Previous experience supporting multiple concurrent efforts/projects in various capacitiesApplication development and support experienceExperience with tools like Dataflux, Python, and Schell scripting.Excellent interpersonal, team, verbal, written and listening skills Education Level  Bachelor Degree  Years Experience 5
